# baritsu

The main goal of baritsu is to implement wrappers for
[mlpack](https://www.mlpack.org/doc/stable/r_documentation.html) that
allows formula as their argument. Also, baritsu provides
[parsnip](https://parsnip.tidymodels.org/) engines of those wrappers, so
they can be used with [tidymodels](https://www.tidymodels.org/)
workflows.

## Installation

You can install the development version of baritsu from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("paithiov909/baritsu")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

``` r
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  require(tidymodels)
  require(baritsu)
})

data("penguins", package = "modeldata")

set.seed(1218)
data_split <- initial_split(penguins, strata = species)
penguins_train <- training(data_split)
penguins_test <- testing(data_split)

rec <-
  recipe(
    species ~ .,
    data = penguins_train
  ) |>
  step_impute_median(all_numeric_predictors()) |>
  step_impute_mode(all_nominal_predictors())

spec <-
  decision_tree(
    tree_depth = 0,
    min_n = 5
  ) |>
  set_engine("baritsu") |>
  set_mode("classification")

translate(spec)
#> Decision Tree Model Specification (classification)
#> 
#> Main Arguments:
#>   tree_depth = 0
#>   min_n = 5
#> 
#> Computational engine: baritsu 
#> 
#> Model fit template:
#> baritsu::decision_trees(formula = missing_arg(), data = missing_arg(), 
#>     x = missing_arg(), y = missing_arg(), tree_depth = 0, min_n = 5)

wf_fit <- workflow() |>
  add_recipe(rec) |>
  add_model(spec) |>
  fit(penguins_train)

pred <- augment(wf_fit, penguins_test) |>
  dplyr::select(species, .pred_class)

pred
#> # A tibble: 86 × 2
#>    species .pred_class
#>    <fct>   <fct>      
#>  1 Adelie  Adelie     
#>  2 Adelie  Adelie     
#>  3 Adelie  Adelie     
#>  4 Adelie  Adelie     
#>  5 Adelie  Adelie     
#>  6 Adelie  Adelie     
#>  7 Adelie  Adelie     
#>  8 Adelie  Adelie     
#>  9 Adelie  Adelie     
#> 10 Adelie  Adelie     
#> # ℹ 76 more rows

f_meas(pred, truth = species, estimate = .pred_class)
#> # A tibble: 1 × 3
#>   .metric .estimator .estimate
#>   <chr>   <chr>          <dbl>
#> 1 f_meas  macro          0.957
```

# Package index

## Classification

- [`adaboost()`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/adaboost.md)
  : AdaBoost
- [`decision_trees()`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/decision_trees.md)
  : Decision trees
- [`hoeffding_trees()`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/hoeffding_trees.md)
  : Hoeffding trees
- [`linear_svm()`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/linear_svm.md)
  : L2-regularized support vector machine
- [`logistic_regression()`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/logistic_regression.md)
  : L2-regularized logistic regression
- [`naive_bayes()`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/naive_bayes.md)
  : Parametric naive Bayes classifier
- [`perceptron()`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/perceptron.md)
  : Single level neural network
- [`random_forest()`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/random_forest.md)
  : Random forests
- [`softmax_regression()`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/softmax_regression.md)
  : Softmax regression

## Regression

- [`linear_regression()`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/linear_regression.md)
  : Linear regression
- [`linear_regression_bayesian()`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/linear_regression_bayesian.md)
  : Bayesian linear regression

## Prediction

- [`predict(`*`<baritsu_ab>`*`)`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/predict.baritsu.md)
  [`predict(`*`<baritsu_dt>`*`)`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/predict.baritsu.md)
  [`predict(`*`<baritsu_ht>`*`)`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/predict.baritsu.md)
  [`predict(`*`<baritsu_blr>`*`)`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/predict.baritsu.md)
  [`predict(`*`<baritsu_lr>`*`)`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/predict.baritsu.md)
  [`predict(`*`<baritsu_lgr>`*`)`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/predict.baritsu.md)
  [`predict(`*`<baritsu_prc>`*`)`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/predict.baritsu.md)
  [`predict(`*`<baritsu_sr>`*`)`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/predict.baritsu.md)
  [`predict(`*`<baritsu_nbc>`*`)`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/predict.baritsu.md)
  [`predict(`*`<baritsu_rf>`*`)`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/predict.baritsu.md)
  [`predict(`*`<baritsu_svm>`*`)`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/predict.baritsu.md)
  : Prediction using mlpack via baritsu
- [`parsnip_engines_baritsu`](https://paithiov909.github.io/baritsu/reference/parsnip_engines_baritsu.md)
  : Parsnip engines in baritsu
